CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 30, 1954, pg. 10, reads: "Backstage at the Nixon - Courier writer Hazel Garland (extreme right) interviews members of the cast of 'Porgy and Bess' which is appearing at the Nixon all this week. Seated, left to right: Miss Irene Williams, Leslie Scott and Miss Elizabeth Foster.  Standing: Frankie Belt, Irving Barnes and LeVern Hutcherson.  The two young ladies alternate in role of Bess while Scott, Barnes and Hutcherson do likewise in the role of Porgy. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors in cast of Porgy and Bess, seated from left: Irene Williams, Leslie Scott, Elizabeth Foster; standing: Frankie Belt, Irving Barnes, LeVern Hutcherson, and Pittsburgh Courier journalist Hazel Garland, backstage at Nixon Theater, another version
